item.title: other
item.description: 乘法 func mul(a:Int, b:Int) -> Int { var big = a > b ? a : b var sma = a < b ? a : b var sum = 0 while sma > 0 { sum += sma & 1 == 0 ? 0 : big sma = sma >> 1 big = big << 1 } return sum } 加法 int add(int a, int b) { stack<bool> st; bool x = false; if((a < b && abs((long)a) > abs((long)b)) || (a > b && abs((long)a) < abs((long)b))){ x = true; } bool flag = false; for (int i = 0; i < 31; i++) { if((a&1) == 1 && (b&1) == 1){ st.
